pr_title: Removed admin monitor related to ZFS

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins into solaris
Restore Solaris-specific functionality other than libzfs
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins into solaris
